top.title: Trump briefed on military and covert options for Iran, sources say
top.summary: The US president also imposes a 25% tariff on countries that "do business" with Tehran, while Iran's foreign minister says his country is "ready for war".

top.title: 'They just kept killing': Eyewitnesses describe deadly crackdown in Iran
top.summary: The BBC has received eyewitness accounts of security forces attacking anti-government protesters across the country.

top.title: World central bank chiefs 'stand in solidarity' with US Fed chair Powell
top.summary: Eleven central banks have backed Jerome Powell after the US launched a criminal investigation into the US Fed.

top.title: What a new law and an investigation could mean for Grok AI deepfakes
top.summary: Elon Musk's chatbot is under fire for altering images of women to remove their clothes without their consent.

top.title: X could 'lose right to self regulate', says Starmer
top.summary: It is currently illegal to share deepfakes, but the law against creating them has not yet come into force.

top.title: Instagram denies breach after many receive emails asking to reset password
top.summary: The social media platform has said there was "no breach of its systems" but questions remain.

title.#text: Insta360’s face-tracking webcams get bigger sensors and more expensive
PC shipments just grew unexpectedly amid RAM shortages
Microsoft is retiring its Office Lens app on iOS and Android
